member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeTransformationResult
member.summary: The result of making a code transformation pass through a compilation unit.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeTransformationResult.TransformationOccured
member.summary: True is the code in the processed compilation unit was transformed.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeTransformationResult.MirrorFilePath
member.summary: The file path to the rewritten code file, which holds the original code of the compilation unit.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeTransformationResult.CompanionFilePath
member.summary: The file path to the companion code file, which holds the newly produced code, that serves as a proxy to the functionality of the compilation unit.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeTransformer
member.summary:
This class provides the core functionality of the library.
It's focal point is method which is responsible for running the code wrapping logic for a compilation unit.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeTransformer.#ctor(NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeTransformer.Wrap(System.String)
member.summary: This function receives a file path and potentially produces a code syntax transformation of that file's code.
member.remarks: This method takes the following steps: 1. Is parses its syntax tree. 2. It scans the parsed syntax tree into a , keeping only the parts relevant to the functionality of this library. 3. If the file needs to be rewritten, then the original file is changed so that its code can be wrapped and companion file with the wrapping code is created.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions
member.summary: This type represents the options passed to , in order to process a compilation unit.
Constructs a new instance.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.OutputBasePath
member.summary: The path to a directory where the directory will be created and the output of will be stored.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.OutputDirectoryName
member.summary: The name of the directory in , where the output of will be stored.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.FileBasePath
member.summary: The path to the directory where the search for *.cs files will be made.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.EndOfLine
member.summary: The EOL character sequence to use for the generated code files.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.AttributeNames
member.summary: The names of the targeted attributes which will cause a compilation unit to be rewritten.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.Usings
member.summary: The using declarations to write in the rewritten compilation unit.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.PropertySyntaxGenerators
member.summary:
Anonymous functions, keyed by an attribute name, that produce property declaration syntax nodes.
The produces properties are part of the code that wraps calls to methods of the compilation unit.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.PreExpressionMappers
member.summary: Anonymous functions, keyed by an attribute name, that produce the new syntax with which a method is wrapped.
member.remarks:
The syntax produced by these is place before the call to the wrapped method.
Together with , they wrap the call to the wrapped method.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.PostExpressionMappers
member.summary: Anonymous functions, keyed by an attribute name, that produce the new syntax with which a method is wrapped.
member.remarks:
The syntax produced by these is place after the call to the wrapped method.
Together with , they wrap the call to the wrapped method.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.OutputDirectory
member.summary: The path to a directory, as a combination of and , where the rewritten code files will be stored.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.SelectUsings(System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet{System.String})
member.summary: Selects using declaration syntax nodes from , based on a list of attribute names.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.SelectPropertySyntaxGenerators(System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet{System.String})
member.summary: Selects property declaration generators from , based on a list of attribute names.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.SelectPreExpressionMappers(System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet{System.String})
member.summary: Selects expression syntax fragments from , based on a list of attribute names.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions.SelectPostExpressionMappers(System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet{System.String})
member.summary: Selects expression syntax fragments from , based on a list of attribute names.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxBuilder
member.summary: This type produces the syntax that wraps method calls in a compilation unit, based on a .

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxBuilder.#ctor(NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope,NETMetaCoder.Core.CodeWrapTransformationOptions@)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxBuilder.Build
member.summary: This method builds the syntax tree which wraps method calls in a compilation unit.
member.remarks: The steps taken by this method are: 1. It instantiates a new syntax tree, which is an instance of , and it traverses the syntax tree held by a . 2. For each namespace, class and struct syntax node, it produces the relevant declaration syntax. 3. In the case when the traversal reaches a method declaration, then the syntax that is produced wraps a call to the original method, using the syntax generators in .

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.ClassOrStructSyntaxEnvelope.#ctor(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.ClassDeclarationSyntax,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Constructs an instance of to hold an instance of , along with a sub tree of its descendant nodes..
member.param: A unique index for the syntax node, in order to identify it again in a later pass.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.ClassOrStructSyntaxEnvelope.MethodSyntaxEnvelopes
member.summary: The method syntax nodes that are direct children of the class or struct syntax node, held by an instance of .

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.ClassOrStructSyntaxEnvelope.AddMethodSyntax(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.MethodDeclarationSyntax,System.UInt16,System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet{System.String},Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.AttributeSyntax)
member.summary: Adds a method declaration syntax node to the envelope.
member.param: The names of the attributes found on the method declaration.
The syntax node for the found on the method declaration, if any.
member.returns: It returns a new envelope, which is a child of the envelope instance in the context of which, was called (ie, it returns the next level in the tree of syntax nodes).

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope
member.summary:
A type that holds a syntax tree for a compilation unit.
The syntax tree serves to filter out all but what is important for this library to work on.
Namely, this library needs only an hierarchy of namespaces, classes, structs and methods.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope.Usings
member.summary: The using declaration syntax nodes that are used in the compilation unit, held by an instance of .

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope.AttributeNamesFound
member.summary: A set of attribute names found, on method declarations, throughout the compilation unit's syntax tree.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope.HasSyntaxToRender
member.summary: Returns true if there are any namespace, class or struct declarations in a compilation unit.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope.AddUsingDirectiveSyntax(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.UsingDirectiveSyntax)
member.summary: Adds a using declaration syntax node to the envelope.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope.AddAttributeNameFound(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a found attribute's name to the envelope.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope.GatherNodeIndices
member.summary:
Gathers the syntax node indices of the whole tree so that the returned can serve as an index of seen syntax nodes.
This is index is used by subsequent compilation unit passes, to filter out unwanted syntax nodes.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.Core.SyntaxEnvelope.SyntaxEnvelope.Prune
member.summary: Prunes the syntax node tree rooted at an instance of from empty children envelopes.
